attributes.action: Harmonise COVID-19 restrictions for England Wales Scotland and Northern Ireland.
attributes.additional_details: The multiple sets of rules and different periods and timing of lockdowns create major and unnecessary difficulties for anyone living close to the border or running a business, as well as four sets of expense for government.
attributes.background: In the same way that the devolved powers do not operate a separate defence policy, neither should they be allowed to operate separate covid policy via a different set of restrictions

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558366
